charged.1: Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous spinning attacks against all nearby opponents.
charged.2: At the end of the sequence, performs a more powerful slash.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Pounces forward using the Wushou arts, leaping high into the air after hitting.
description.1: After Gaming has used Bestial Ascent to rise into the air, he will use the especially powerful Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider when performing a Plunging Attack.
description.4: The DMG from Plunging Attacks caused by Bestial Ascent is converted to <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro>. Upon landing, Gaming will consume a fixed amount of HP. Gaming's HP cannot be reduced below 10% by this method.
description.5: Charmed Cloudstrider DMG is considered Plunging Attack DMG.
description.7: "The beast leaps and plucks the greens, prosperity all around us rings. May wealth and health come to us all — and may we have a grand ol' ball!"

description.0: Gaming enters Wushou Stance, recovering a fixed amount of HP, and summons his companion, the Horned Lion Man Chai, to smash into his target, dealing <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.
description.1: After bashing its target, Man Chai will roll to a nearby location before moving towards Gaming. When it links up with Gaming, Man Chai will leave the field and reset the CD for Gaming's Elemental Skill, Bestial Ascent.
description.2: While Wushou Stance is active, when Gaming performs Charmed Cloustrider or completes the pounce attack from Bestial Ascent with over 50% HP, he will summon Man Chai again.
description.3: Only 1 Man Chai can be on the field simultaneously.
description.5: "The golden beast brings fortune, blazing lights, and brilliant sights! Now that's what you call an abundant life!"

skillParams.0: Horned Lion Man Chai Smash DMG

description.0: For 1s after hitting an opponent with Bestial Ascent's Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider, Gaming will recover 10% of his HP.
When Gaming has less than 50% HP, he will receive a 20% Incoming Healing Bonus. When Gaming has 50% HP or more, he will gain a 20% Pyro DMG Bonus.
Increases the Movement SPD of your own party members by 10% during the day (6:00 – 18:00).
description.1: Does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or Spiral Abyss. Not stackable with Passive Talents that provide the exact same effects.

description.0: When the Horned Lion Man Chai from Horned Lion's Gilded Dance meets back up with Gaming, it will heal 25% of Gaming's HP.
When Gaming receives healing and this instance of healing overflows, his ATK will be increased by 20% for 5s.
Increases the Level of Bestial Ascent by 3.
When Bestial Ascent's Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider hits an opponent, it will restore 2 Energy to Gaming. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s.
Increases the Level of Horned Lion's Gilded Dance by 3.
Bestial Ascent's Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider CRIT Rate increased by 20% and CRIT DMG increased by 40%, and its attack radius will be increased.
